actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to provide for Federal standards to more effectively protect the public against asbestos contamination.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency, the Consumer Product Safety Commission, the Food and Drug Administration, and any other appropriate Federal agencies to take action within their respective jurisdictions to provide more effective protection against asbestos in the air, the water, and in the production and distribution of goods and services.

titles.title: A bill to provide for Federal standards to more effectively protect the public against asbestos contamination.
